sentences.en: "I was always chasing after unsuitable men," she says.
Amy's shoes were unsuitable for walking any distance.
sentences.cn: 埃米的鞋子根本不适合走路。

sentences.en: An abrasive material is unsuitable for cleaning baths.
sentences.cn: 有磨蚀作用的材料不适合擦浴缸.

sentences.en: He was wearing shoes that were totally unsuitable for climbing.
sentences.cn: 他穿了一双完全不适合登山的鞋子。

sentences.en: He's got all the right qualifications but is temperamentally unsuitable.
sentences.cn: 他具备所需要的一切合格证件,惟独性情不适合.

sentences.en: Her parents will never acquiesce in such an unsuitable marriage.
sentences.cn: 她的父母决不会答应这门不相宜的婚事.

sentences.en: His remark was well / badly timed, ie made at a suitable / an unsuitable moment.
sentences.cn: 他说的话正合[不合]时宜.

sentences.en: I was sometimes dumped with my grandmother or left with highly unsuitable au pairs.
sentences.cn: 有时我被扔给奶奶照看，或者被交给毫无经验的临时保姆。

sentences.en: Jeya feels that her ambitious nature made her unsuitable for an arranged marriage.
sentences.cn: 耶娅觉得她不安分的个性不适合包办的婚姻。

sentences.en: Some were obviously unsuitable and could be ruled out at once. Others were borderline cases.
sentences.cn: 一些明显不合适，可以马上排除。另一些则勉强合格。

sentences.en: The committee hurled out the requests as being completely unsuitable.
sentences.cn: 委员会认为这项要求全然不妥,因而拒绝接受.

sentences.en: The dress is unsuitable for summer.
sentences.cn: 那件衣服不适合夏季穿.

sentences.en: This area is unsuitable for heavy industry.
sentences.cn: 该地区不适宜发展重工业.

sentences.en: This ware is suitable for decorative purpose but unsuitable for utility.

sentences.cn: 那些不合格的候选人被筛选掉了.

trans.tran_cn: 不合适的，不适宜的，不相称的
trans.tran_en: not having the right qualities for a particular person, purpose, or situation
